scripts.wipe-dev-db: wrangler d1 execute DB_DEV --command="DELETE FROM verses; DELETE FROM sessions; DELETE FROM magic_links; DELETE FROM users;"
scripts.dev:stats: npx wrangler d1 execute scripture-memory-dev --env development --command="SELECT * FROM user_stats WHERE user_id = 1;"
scripts.db:prod:users: wrangler d1 execute DB --env production --remote --command="SELECT * FROM users;"
scripts.db:prod:verses: wrangler d1 execute DB --env production --remote --command="SELECT * FROM verses;"
scripts.db:prod:sessions: wrangler d1 execute DB --env production --remote --command="SELECT * FROM sessions;"
scripts.db:prod:magic-links: wrangler d1 execute DB --env production --remote --command="SELECT * FROM magic_links;"
